paper_abstract: We present NIGO, a Numerical Integrator of Galactic Orbits. The code has been designed to predict the orbital evolution of test particles moving within a fully-analytical gravitational potential generated by a multi-component galaxy. The code can simulate the orbits of stars in elliptical and disc galaxies, including non-axisymmetric components represented by a spiral pattern and/or rotating bar(s). We describe the main features, algorithms and performance of the code and include the results of some test examples of science cases. (C) 2015 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: NIGO: A Numerical Integrator of Galactic Orbits
